UI Field: Were you driving your usual vehicle?
Notes: Radio button group (values: 'yes' or 'no') - Migration 008 changed from BOOLEAN to TEXT
Input field (id='license-plate') - User enters license plate for DVLA lookup
Display element (id='vehicle-make') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-model') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-colour') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-year') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-fuel') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-mot-status') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-mot-expiry') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-tax-status') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-tax-due') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback
Display element (id='vehicle-insurance-status') - Auto-populated from DVLA API or manual entry fallback

UI Field: My vehicle has no visible damage
Notes: Checkbox (id='no-damage-checkbox') - If checked, hides damage section
Checkbox (value='front') - Array of impact points (Migration 008 changed from TEXT to TEXT[])

UI Field: Point of Impact - Front Driver Side
Notes: Checkbox (value='front_driver') - Array of impact points

UI Field: Point of Impact - Front Passenger Side
Notes: Checkbox (value='front_passenger') - Array of impact points
Checkbox (value='driver_side') - Array of impact points
Checkbox (value='passenger_side') - Array of impact points

UI Field: Point of Impact - Rear Driver Side
Notes: Checkbox (value='rear_driver') - Array of impact points

UI Field: Point of Impact - Rear Passenger Side
Notes: Checkbox (value='rear_passenger') - Array of impact points
Checkbox (value='rear') - Array of impact points
Checkbox (value='roof') - Array of impact points
Checkbox (value='undercarriage') - Array of impact points
Textarea (id='damage-description') - User's narrative description of damage
Checkbox (id='driveable-yes', value='yes') - Mutually exclusive checkbox group (Migration 008 changed from BOOLEAN to TEXT)
Checkbox (id='driveable-no', value='no') - Mutually exclusive checkbox group
Checkbox (id='driveable-unsure', value='unsure') - Mutually exclusive checkbox group
